title: SPEC ~ First Blood
resume: Like the original series, "SPEC" will revolve around a pair of  police detectives as part of a special division solving difficult cases  (Mishou). Touma Saya is a woman with an IQ of 201 and an inability to  "read the atmosphere" in social situations. Due to a previous case, her  left arm is in a sling. Her partner Sebumi Takeru used to be the star  performer of the Metropolitan Police. After some incident however, he  was transferred to Mishou. Those two track down offenders with special  abilities(SPEC) who managed to get away with their crimes.

Login to create it. en Login Sign Up  ID: 45923   Expand SPEC ~ First Blood   (2010) User Score Overview Like the original series, "SPEC" will revolve around a pair of  police detectives as part of a special division solving difficult cases  (Mishou). Touma Saya is a woman with an IQ of 201 and an inability to  "read the atmosphere" in social situations. Due to a previous case, her  left arm is in a sling. Her partner Sebumi Takeru used to be the star  performer of the Metropolitan Police. After some incident however, he  was transferred to Mishou. Those two track down offenders with special  abilities(SPEC) who managed to get away with their crimes.
